mapper.update: UPDATE rgdb."UrT0705ChoteiKyotsu" SET "fukaShoriJokyo" = 'true' FROM rgdb."UrT0705ChoteiKyotsu" AS "UrT0705" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT2003Kibetsu" AS "DbT2003" ON "DbT2003"."choteiId" = "UrT0705"."choteiId" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT2002Fuka" AS "DbT2002" ON "DbT2002"."choteiNendo" = "DbT2003"."choteiNendo" AND "DbT2002"."fukaNendo" = "DbT2003"."fukaNendo" AND "DbT2002"."tsuchishoNo" = "DbT2003"."tsuchishoNo" AND "DbT2002"."rirekiNo" = "DbT2003"."rirekiNo" WHERE "DbT2002"."fukaNendo" = #{fukaNendo} AND "DbT2002"."choteiNichiji" = #{choteiNichiji}
